backend/main.mo: Defines the main canister actor with prompt, blog, favorites, user profile management, and access-control‑protected admin operations.
backend/migration.mo: Provides migration logic that clones existing prompts and injects predefined initial prompts without duplication.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing idempotent prompt persistence and related frontend file involvement.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of short summaries for all frontend files describing their roles and components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme variables and base styling.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file mounting the React app and loading the main entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up routing, lazy-loaded pages, global layout, theme provider, and toast notifications.
Authentication button handling Internet Identity login/logout and react-query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog for new users to enter their name and save a user profile via backend mutation.
frontend/src/components/categories/Categ: Renders a responsive grid of category cards linking to the library with category filters applied.
frontend/src/components/categories/categ: Defines category metadata and exports a list plus a helper to look up category info by key.
frontend/src/components/categories/Categ: Displays a category icon using a sprite sheet with computed background offsets.
frontend/src/components/common/CopyButto: Button that copies text to the clipboard and shows success or error feedback.
frontend/src/components/common/FormStatu: Shows loading, success, or error alerts based on form submission state.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Wraps the app with header, footer, and main content structure.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Displays site footer with logo, navigation links, and copyright info.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Provides the site header with logo, navigation, theme toggle, auth actions, and mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/prompts/Favorite: Toggles a prompt as a favorite, requiring login and handling membership or error cases.
frontend/src/components/prompts/PromptCa: Compact card showing prompt info, category, badges, copy access, and favorite toggle.
frontend/src/components/prompts/PromptDe: Full prompt details view with category info, premium gating, copy functionality, and usage instructions.
frontend/src/components/prompts/PromptFi: UI component providing search, category, tier, and sort filters with active filter badges and reset handling.
frontend/src/components/seo/Seo.tsx: Updates document title and description meta tag based on provided SEO props.
frontend/src/components/theme/ThemeProvi: Context provider managing light, dark, and system themes with persistence and DOM class updates.
frontend/src/components/theme/ThemeToggl: Dropdown button allowing users to switch between light, dark, and system themes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on identity, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Wrapper hook returning the current user's profile query.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Returns a debounced version of a value that updates after a delay.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity auth state, login, logout, stored identities, and provides related context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for prompts, favorites, admin checks, profile data, and mutations using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom light/dark theme variables with transitions and custom scrollbars.
frontend/src/lib/blogRouting.ts: Builds blog post URLs from titles and IDs and extracts post IDs from slug strings.
frontend/src/lib/download.ts: Utility functions to download single or multiple prompts as text files.
frontend/src/lib/promptFilter.ts: Applies search, category, tier, and sort filters to prompt lists and returns the filtered results.
frontend/src/lib/promptRouting.ts: Builds SEO-friendly prompt URLs from title and ID and parses prompt IDs from URL slugs.
frontend/src/lib/validation.ts: Provides basic string validators for email, name, and message fields used in forms.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider and mounts App.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Static About page describing PromptFarm AI’s mission, offerings, and quality focus.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPromptsPage.tsx: Admin-only interface for creating new prompts with validation, tag parsing, and backend submission.
frontend/src/pages/AuthPage.tsx: Handles user login flow, redirects authenticated users, and shows profile setup when needed.
frontend/src/pages/BlogIndexPage.tsx: Fetches and displays a grid of blog posts with titles, excerpts, and links to post pages.
frontend/src/pages/BlogPostPage.tsx: Loads a single blog post by parsed ID and renders its full content with navigation controls.
frontend/src/pages/CategoriesPage.tsx: Lists all prompt categories using a grid component with SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Implements a contact form with validation, error handling, and submission via backend hook.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Shows user dashboard with favorites, membership tab, and download functionality, requiring authentication.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with a hero section, category grid, and feature highlights using various UI components and SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/MembershipPage.tsx: Displays free and premium membership plans, showing current user status and plan features with upgrade or downgrade actions.
frontend/src/pages/NewsletterPage.tsx: Provides a newsletter signup form with validation, subscription handling, and status feedback along with SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/PromptDetailsPage.tsx: Fetches and displays details for a specific prompt, handling loading and not-found states with navigation back to the library.
frontend/src/pages/PromptLibraryPage.tsx: Loads all prompts and applies filters, search, sorting, and category syncing to display a browsable prompt library.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL and session-based parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config enabling dark mode, custom colors, extended theme options, and typography/container/animation plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the project state, existing features, and new feature requests for adding and persisting 30 categorized AI prompts.
